post.summary: Triggers manual synchronization of AIAsset aggregates for the authenticated user's active tenant.
post.description:
This endpoint creates an asynchronous job to synchronize all AI assets for the tenant.
The job is executed by background services and may take several minutes to complete depending on dataset size.
            
Job Status Tracking:
- The response includes a Job object with an Id property
- Poll GET /v1/JobOrchestration/{jobId} to retrieve current job status
- Job.Status values: Created (queued)  Success (completed) | Failed (error) | Cancelled
- Job.TaskStatusCount shows progress of individual tasks
- Job.CompletedAt indicates when the sync finished
            
Timeout: Jobs have a 30-minute timeout with up to 2 automatic retries on transient failures.

200.description: Sync job created successfully. Use the returned Job.Id to track status.

403.description: User does not have required role.

post.summary:
Initiates an asynchronous analysis of Google Workspace third-party app integrations across all users in a domain.
This endpoint requires Google service account credentials with domain-wide delegation.
The analysis runs in the background and returns immediately with an analysis run ID for status polling.

requestBody.description: The analysis request containing service account credentials and domain information.

202.description: Analysis job has been queued. Returns the analysis run ID for status polling.

400.description: Invalid request data or authentication credentials.

500.description: Internal server error while queueing the analysis.

post.summary:
Initiates an asynchronous analysis of Microsoft Graph tenant for third-party application integrations and OAuth2 permission grants.
The analysis runs in the background and returns immediately with an analysis run ID for status polling.

requestBody.description: The Microsoft Graph integration analysis request containing authentication details.

202.description: Analysis job has been queued. Returns the analysis run ID for status polling.

400.description: Invalid request parameters or authentication credentials.

500.description: Internal server error while queueing the analysis.

An optional comma-separated list of Project IDs (GUIDs) to filter the items.
If provided, only items associated with the specified projects will be returned.
Example: projectId=123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000,abcdefab-1234-5678-90ab-cdefabcdefab.

parameters.name: agentIds
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list of Agent IDs (GUIDs) to filter the items.
If provided, only tools used by the specified agents will be returned.
Example: agentIds=123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000,abcdefab-1234-5678-90ab-cdefabcdefab.

parameters.description: A value to filter by the tool's toolType.

parameters.description: A value to filter by the tool's category. Categories are dependent on the tool type.

parameters.name: includeGlobal

allOf.description:
An AgentCard conveys key information:
- Overall details (version, name, description, uses)
- Skills: A set of capabilities the agent can perform
- Default modalities/content types supported by the agent.
- Authentication requirements.

LoopStepConfigurationDefinition.description: Export class for loop container step configuration in a pipeline.

stopOnError.description:
Gets a value indicating whether the pipeline execution should stop if an error occurs during loop execution.
If true, any exception in a loop iteration will cause the entire pipeline to fail.
If false (default), errors in individual iterations are logged but the loop continues with remaining items.

maxIterations.description: Gets the maximum number of iterations for the loop.

executionMode.description:
Gets the execution mode for loop iterations.
Sequential (default) executes iterations one at a time in order.
Parallel executes iterations concurrently.

parallelConfiguration.description: Gets the parallel execution configuration when ExecutionMode is Parallel.

batchConfiguration.description: Gets the batch execution configuration when ExecutionMode is Batch.

LoopStepParallelConfigurationDefinition.description: Configuration for parallel execution in loop steps.

maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: Gets the maximum number of concurrent iterations when ExecutionMode is Parallel.

LoopStepBatchConfigurationDefinition.description: Configuration for batch execution in loop steps.

batchSize.description: Gets the number of items to process in each batch.

batchDelaySeconds.description: Gets the delay in seconds between processing each batch.

ConditionalBranchConfigurationDefinition.description: Conditional Branch Configuration Definition for pipeline export/import.

id.description: Gets or sets the Id.

RetryConfigurationDefinition.description: Configuration for step retry behavior with exponential backoff.

enabled.description:
Gets a value indicating whether retries are enabled or disabled.
Default value: false.

maxRetries.description:
Gets the maximum number of retry attempts.
Must be greater than 0 when retries are enabled.
Default value: 3.

delay.description:
Gets the base delay between retries in milliseconds.
When using exponential backoff, this is the initial delay that gets multiplied.
When using constant delay (BackoffMultiplier = 1.0), this is the fixed delay between all retries.
Must be greater than 0.
Default value: 1000.

maxDelay.description:
Gets the maximum delay between retries in milliseconds.
Must be greater than or equal to Delay.
Default value: 30_000.

backoffMultiplier.description:
Gets the backoff multiplier for exponential backoff.
Must be greater than or equal to 1.0.
Default value: 1.0.

useJitter.description:
Gets a value indicating whether to use jitter to randomize retry delays.
This helps prevent thundering herd problems.
Default value: false.

SdkStepDefinition.description: Represents an SDK step definition for export/import.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the SDK step.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the SDK step.

sdkStepType.description: Gets or sets the type of SDK step (e.g., "HttpRequest", "OneDrive_ListItems").

category.description: Gets or sets the SDK step category (e.g., "Actions", "Logic").

group.description: Gets or sets the SDK step group (e.g., "Http", "OneDrive").

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the SDK step definition.

stepParameters.description:
Gets or sets the serialized step parameters (JSON).
Contains all non-credential configuration.

credentialReferences.description:
Gets or sets the credential references used by this SDK step.
Maps parameter property names to credential definitions.

supportedCredentialTypes.description:
Gets or sets the supported credential types for this step.
Used for validation during import.

SdkStepCredentialReference.description: Represents a credential reference within an SDK step.

propertyName.description:
Gets or sets the property name in the parameters class (e.g., "CredentialId").
Used to identify which parameter field to populate during import.

originalCredentialId.description:
Gets or sets the original credential ID from the exported environment.
Used as key for credential mapping during import.

credentialsDefinition.description: Gets or sets the credential definition (name, type, encrypted/placeholder values).

required.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this credential is required by the SDK step.

supportedTypes.description: Gets or sets the supported credential types for this reference.

SdkStepDefinitionModel.description: DTO for SDK step definitions with JSON schema for parameters.

stepType.description: Gets or sets the SDK step type as a string.

category.description: Gets or sets the category for grouping in the toolbox.

group.description: Gets or sets the optional group for further categorization within a category.

subGroup.description: Gets or sets the optional sub group for further categorization within a group.

inputHandles.description:
Gets or sets the number of input handles supported.
-1 => unlimited, 0 => does not support input, 1+ => specific count.

outputHandles.description:
Gets or sets the number of output handles supported.
-1 => unlimited, 0 => does not support output, 1+ => specific count.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this step is enabled.

featureFlag.description: Gets or sets the feature flag to check if this step is enabled.

icon.description:
Gets or sets the icon name for frontend rendering.
If null, the frontend will use a default icon based on category or step type.

isBranching.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this step has branching behavior.
Branching steps can produce multiple output paths (e.g., if/else conditions).

parametersSchema.description: Gets or sets the JSON schema for the step parameters (input).

outputSchema.description:
Gets or sets the JSON schema for the step output.
Null if the step doesn't produce structured output or output type is unknown.

SdkStepCategory.description:
A step category enum.
This category is mandatory.

SdkStepGroup.description:
An sdk step group.
This group is optional.

memberNames.description: Gets or sets the member names that have errors.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

stepType.description: Gets or sets the SDK step type as a string.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters as a JSON document.

SdkOptionsLoadResult.description: Represents the result of loading dynamic options for an SDK step parameter.

success.description: Gets a value indicating whether the options were loaded successfully.

options.description: Gets the loaded options if successful.

errorMessage.description: Gets the error message if loading failed.

missingFields.description: Gets the names of missing required fields if that caused the failure.

SdkStepOption.description: Represents a single option for a dynamic SDK step parameter.

name.description: Gets or sets the display name shown in the UI.

value.description: Gets or sets the actual value stored in the workflow.

metadata.description:
Gets or sets optional metadata for extended information about this option.
Used by specialized loaders (e.g., folder browsers) to provide additional context
such as item type, ID, size, or provider-specific information.

RetryConfiguration.description: Configuration for step retry behavior with exponential backoff.

enabled.description:
Gets a value indicating whether retries are enabled or disabled.
Default value: false.

maxRetries.description:
Gets the maximum number of retry attempts.
Must be greater than 0 when retries are enabled.
Default value: 3.

delay.description:
Gets the base delay between retries in milliseconds.
When using exponential backoff, this is the initial delay that gets multiplied.
When using constant delay (BackoffMultiplier = 1.0), this is the fixed delay between all retries.
Must be greater than 0.
Default value: 1000.

maxDelay.description:
Gets the maximum delay between retries in milliseconds.
Must be greater than or equal to Delay.
Default value: 30_000.

backoffMultiplier.description:
Gets the backoff multiplier for exponential backoff.
Must be greater than or equal to 1.0.
Default value: 1.0.

useJitter.description:
Gets a value indicating whether to use jitter to randomize retry delays.
This helps prevent thundering herd problems.
Default value: false.

PipelineAlignment.description:
The alignment of the pipeline in the UI.
The Default value is Horizontal.

allOf.description: Class representing a job task.

status.description: Gets or sets the job status.

cancellationReason.description: Gets or sets the cancellation reason for this job task.

isWaitingForCompletion.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this task is waiting for an asynchronous operation to complete.
When true, the task should not be re-executed and is waiting for external polling or callbacks
to determine the final outcome. Used for long-running async jobs like external API calls.

sequenceNumber.description: Gets or sets the sequence number of the task.

failuresCount.description: Gets or sets the failure count.

schedulingAttemptsCount.description: Gets or sets the number of attempts to schedule the task.

nextSchedulingAttemptAt.description:
Gets or sets the earliest time this task should be considered for scheduling again.
Used to implement exponential backoff when tasks are repeatedly throttled by the scheduler.
When set, the task will not be fetched by the scheduler until this time has passed,
reducing database load by preventing continuous status updates for throttled tasks.

Gets or sets the issuer URL for the external IDP.
This is used to validate the 'iss' claim in incoming JWTs.
Example: https://login.microsoftonline.com/{tenant-id}/v2.0.

jwksUrl.description:
Gets or sets the JWKS (JSON Web Key Set) URL for the external IDP.
This is used to fetch public keys for JWT signature validation.
Example: https://login.microsoftonline.com/{tenant-id}/discovery/v2.0/keys.

audience.description:
Gets or sets the expected audience claim value.
This is validated against the 'aud' claim in incoming JWTs.

claimMappings.description:
Gets or sets the JSON object containing claim mappings from external IDP claims to internal platform claims.
Example: {"oid": "user_id", "email": "email", "name": "name"}.

enableJwtPassThrough.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether JWT pass-through is enabled for tool execution.
When enabled, the original JWT from the external IDP is forwarded to downstream tool calls.

isEnabled.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this external IDP configuration is enabled.
When disabled, authentication will fall back to the default Keycloak IDP.

allowedClockSkewSeconds.description:
Gets or sets the allowed clock skew in seconds for token validation.
This accounts for time differences between servers.

validateLifetime.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to validate the token lifetime.
Should typically be true for production environments.

validateIssuer.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to validate the issuer.
Should typically be true to ensure tokens come from the expected IDP.

validateAudience.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to validate the audience.
Should typically be true to ensure tokens are intended for this application.

metadata.description:
Gets or sets optional metadata as a JSON string.
Can be used to store additional IDP-specific configuration.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant identifier associated with this external IDP configuration.

Gets a dictionary from a data source GUID to an array of folder GUIDs.
Only these folder GUIDs will be used in the pipeline execution as an override to using all folders.
Folder GUIDs should be uploaded in the corresponding Data Source.
Folder GUIDs of files not present in the corresponding Data Source will be ignored.
If empty, all files in the data sources will be used.

Gets a dictionary from a data source GUID to an array of file GUIDs.
Only these file GUIDs will be used in the pipeline execution as an override to using all files.
File GUIDs should be uploaded in the corresponding Data Source.
File GUIDs of files not present in the corresponding Data Source will be ignored.
If empty, all files in the data sources will be used.

useExternalUserMapping.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable external user identity mapping for webhook events.
When enabled, the webhook will attempt to resolve the Airia platform user from external system user IDs (e.g., Slack user ID).
Null indicates the feature is not configured (default behavior for existing webhooks).

requireUserMapping.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether external user mapping is required for processing webhook events.
When true, webhook events without a valid user mapping will be rejected.
Only applies when UseExternalUserMapping is true.
Null indicates the feature is not configured (default behavior for existing webhooks).

autoProvisionUsers.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically provision new users when no mapping exists.
When enabled and a mapping is not found, a new Airia user will be created and linked to the external user.
Only applies when UseExternalUserMapping is true.
Null indicates the feature is not configured (default behavior for existing webhooks).

provisionedUserRole.description:
Gets or sets the role to assign to auto-provisioned users.
If null, a default role will be assigned based on tenant configuration.
Only applies when AutoProvisionUsers is true.

sendTypingIndicator.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send typing indicators when processing webhook events.
When enabled, the webhook will send typing/activity indicators to the external system during processing.
Null indicates the feature is not configured (default behavior for existing webhooks).

RedTeamingDashboardResponse.description: Response model for Red Teaming dashboard with aggregated metrics across all Red Teaming evaluations.

securityScore.description:
Gets or sets the overall security score (0-100) across all Red Teaming evaluations.
Higher scores indicate better security. Null if no valid evaluations exist.

Gets or sets the average Attack Success Rate (ASR) as a percentage across all evaluations.
Lower percentages indicate better security. Null if no valid evaluations exist.

vulnerabilitiesFound.description: Gets or sets the total number of vulnerabilities found across all evaluations.

maxVulnerabilities.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of vulnerabilities tested across all evaluations.

totalAttacks.description: Gets or sets the total number of attacks tested for this category.

Data transfer object for red teaming evaluation dataset information.
Contains dataset details with TaskResult information extracted from Job execution.

prompt.description: Gets the input prompt from the agent evaluation dataset.

Gets the test identifier from the evaluation task result.
Extracted from JobTask TaskResult JsonB field.

category.description:
Gets the attack category for this dataset from the task result.
Extracted from JobTask TaskResult JsonB field.

severity.description:
Gets the severity level (1-5) for this dataset from the task result.
Extracted from JobTask TaskResult JsonB field. Null for legacy results that don't have severity.

reason.description:
Gets the reason/rationale for the vulnerability from the task result.
Extracted from JobTask TaskResult JsonB field. Null for legacy results that don't have reason.

ToolRedTeamingResponse.description:
Response from tool red-teaming analysis.
This represents PRE-attack analysis results for OWASP LLM06:2025 (Excessive Agency) vulnerabilities.

Gets or sets the list of security attack scenarios targeting tool vulnerabilities.
These goals can be used with the /api/attack/async endpoint with 'analyze_tools' flag enabled.

Gets or sets the analysis explanation for OWASP LLM06:2025 excessive agency.
Provides detailed reasoning about identified vulnerabilities.

Gets or sets the structured tool analysis data.
Contains detailed analysis of each tool's security properties.

Gets or sets the raw pipeline configuration JSON.
Contains the complete pipeline configuration that was analyzed.

ConstraintRuleCriteriaResponseV1.description: Response model for constraint rule criteria.

id.description: Gets or sets the criteria ID.

fieldPath.description: Gets or sets the field path to evaluate.

operator.description: Gets or sets the criteria operator.

value.description: Gets or sets the value to compare against.

name.description: Gets or sets the rule name.

description.description: Gets or sets the rule description.

action.description: Gets or sets the action to take when the rule matches.

priority.description: Gets or sets the rule priority (higher values evaluated first).

isActive.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the rule is active.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the optional project ID for project-scoped rules.

agentIds.description:
Gets or sets the list of agent IDs this constraint rule applies to.
If empty or null, the rule applies to all agents.

gatewayIds.description:
Gets or sets the list of gateway IDs this constraint rule applies to.
If empty or null, the rule applies to all gateways.

expressionJson.description:
Gets or sets the optional JSON expression for complex nested conditions.
Takes precedence over Criteria if provided.

expressionVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the JSON expression structure.

scope.description:
Gets or sets the scope where this constraint rule applies.
Defaults to Agents for backward compatibility.

criteria.description:
Gets or sets the rule criteria.
Used when ExpressionJson is not provided.

ShadowAiBrowserExtensionRuleResponseV1.description: Response model for Shadow AI browser extension rule.

id.description: Gets or sets the rule ID.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant ID.

userIds.description: Gets or sets the user IDs this rule applies to.

groupIds.description: Gets or sets the group IDs this rule applies to.

blockedDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to block.

warnDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to warn about.

monitorDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to monitor.

redirectMappings.description: Gets or sets the redirect mappings (domain to URL).

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the rule is enabled.

warningMessage.description: Gets or sets the warning message to display.

blockMessage.description: Gets or sets the block message to display.

configVersion.description: Gets or sets the configuration version.

EffectiveShadowAiPolicyResponseV1.description:
Response model for the effective Shadow AI policy for the current user.
Contains only the evaluated policy data needed by the browser extension.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Shadow AI policy is enabled for the current user.

blockedDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to block. Empty if IsEnabled is false.

warnDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to warn about (allow with warning). Empty if IsEnabled is false.

monitorDomains.description: Gets or sets the domains to monitor (log silently). Empty if IsEnabled is false.

redirectMappings.description: Gets or sets the redirect mappings: domain to redirect URL. Empty if IsEnabled is false.

warningMessage.description: Gets or sets the warning message to display. Null if IsEnabled is false.

blockMessage.description: Gets or sets the block message to display. Null if IsEnabled is false.

captureRequestBody.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to capture request body. False if IsEnabled is false.

maxBodySize.description: Gets or sets the maximum body size to capture (bytes). 0 if IsEnabled is false.

configVersion.description: Gets or sets the configuration version for browser extension sync. 0 if IsEnabled is false.

blockMessage.description: Gets or sets the block message to display.

captureRequestBody.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to capture request body.

SecurePostureProvider.description: Defines the types of platform integration providers for secure posture management operations.

PagedResultOfConnectionResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

ConnectionResponse.description: Represents a connection response containing connection information and metadata.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider associated with the connection.

userId.description: Gets or sets the user identifier associated with the connection.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant identifier associated with the connection.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the connection was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the connection was last updated.

AgentRefreshResponse.description: Represents the response from an agent refresh operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the refresh operation.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the refresh operation.

message.description: Gets or sets the message describing the refresh operation result.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the refresh operation was completed.

details.description: Gets or sets the detailed information about the refresh operation.

AgentRefreshDetails.description: Represents detailed information about agent refresh operations.

systemName.description: Gets or sets the name of the system where the refresh operation occurred.

responseTimeMs.description: Gets or sets the response time of the refresh operation in milliseconds.

createdAgents.description: Gets or sets the number of agents created during the refresh operation.

updatedAgents.description: Gets or sets the number of agents updated during the refresh operation.

deletedAgents.description: Gets or sets the number of agents deleted during the refresh operation.

refreshResults.description: Gets or sets the list of results from the refresh operation, which may include success or error messages for each agent processed.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider associated with the connection.

agentCount.description: Gets or sets the count of agents for this connection.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the connection was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the connection was last updated.

connection.description: Gets or sets the dictionary containing additional connection properties and metadata.

PagedResultOfAgentResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

AgentResponse.description: Represents an agent response containing agent information and metadata.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the agent.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider associated with the agent.

spmConnectionId.description: Gets or sets the SPM connection identifier associated with the agent.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the agent was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the agent was last updated.

agentDictionary.description: Gets or sets the dictionary containing additional agent properties and metadata.

externalId.description: Gets or sets the external identifier of the agent in the provider system.

versionId.description: Gets or sets the version identifier of the agent, if available.

isActive.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the agent is currently active, if available.

nodesCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of nodes in the agent, if available.

aiModelNames.description: Gets or sets the names of models used by the agent, if available.

aiProviderNames.description: Gets or sets the names of providers used by the agent, if available.

aiNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of AI nodes in the agent, if available.

aiSecurableNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of AI nodes that can be secured in the agent, if available.

securedNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of secured nodes in the agent, if available.

credentialsCount.description: Gets or sets the number of credentials associated with the agent, if available.

externalUpdatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the agent was last updated in the external system, if available.

securedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the agent was secured, if available.

secureApiKeyId.description: Gets or sets the secure API key ID used for the agent, if available.

securedStatus.description: Gets or sets the security status of the agent.

securedNote.description: Gets or sets additional notes about the agent's security status, if available.

refreshedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the agent was last refreshed, if available.

securityScore.description: Gets or sets the security score assigned to this agent (0-100 scale).

securityScoreStatus.description: Gets or sets the current status of the security score analysis for this agent.

securityAnalysisDetails.description: Gets or sets additional details or error messages related to the security analysis.

securityAnalyzedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the security analysis was last performed on this agent.

SpmSecurityScoreStatus.description:
Defines the security score analysis status for SPM agents.
These states represent synchronous processing results from the AI-SPM-Engine.

PagedResultOfComponentResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

ComponentResponse.description: Represents a component response containing component information and metadata.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the component.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the component.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider associated with the component.

externalId.description: Gets or sets the external identifier of the component.

externalType.description: Gets or sets the type of the component, if available.

externalTypeVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the component type, if available.

componentType.description: Gets or sets the component type that distinguishes between AI models and other components.

credentialsCount.description: Gets or sets the number of credentials associated with the component, if available.

parametersCount.description: Gets or sets the number of parameters associated with the component, if available.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was last updated.

componentDictionary.description: Gets or sets the dictionary containing additional component properties and metadata.

aiModelName.description: Gets or sets the model name associated with the component, if available.

aiProviderName.description: Gets or sets the provider name used by this component.

aiSecurable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this component can be secured, if available.

securedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was secured, if available.

secureApiKeyId.description: Gets or sets the secure API key ID used for the component, if available.

gatewayConfigurationId.description:
Gets or sets the gateway configuration ID associated with this component's API key, if available.
This ID references the gateway configuration used to secure this component.

securedStatus.description: Gets or sets the security status of the component.

securedNote.description: Gets or sets additional notes about the component's security status, if available.

SpmComponentType.description: Represents the type of secure posture management component.

ConnectionCreateResponse.description: Represents the response from a connection creation operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the created connection.

ConnectionCreateRequest.description: Represents a request to create a new SPM connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider for the connection.

connection.description: Gets or sets the connection configuration as a key-value dictionary.

ConnectionUpdateRequest.description: Represents a request to update an existing SPM connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

connection.description: Gets or sets the updated connection configuration as a key-value dictionary, if provided.

AgentSecureResponse.description: Represents the response from an agent security operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the security operation.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the security operation.

message.description: Gets or sets the message describing the security operation result.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the security operation was completed.

details.description: Gets or sets the detailed information about the security operation.

errorCategory.description:
Gets or sets the error category if status is "error".
Should be one of the constants from ErrorCategory.

AgentSecureDetails.description: Represents detailed information about agent security configuration and credentials.

agentId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.

workflowId.description: Gets or sets the workflow identifier associated with the agent.

modelId.description: Gets or sets the model identifier associated with the agent.

aiProviders.description: Gets or sets the AI service used by the agent.

aiModels.description: Gets or sets the AI model used by the agent.

gatewayUrl.description: Gets or sets the gateway URL for the agent.

responseTimeMs.description: Gets or sets the response time of the security operation in milliseconds.

credentialsCreated.description: Gets or sets a value indicating number of created credentials.

credentialNames.description: Gets or sets the names of the used credential, if any.

bedrockAgentId.description: Gets or sets the Bedrock Agent ID that handles routing through the gateway.

AgentSecureRequest.description: Represents a request to secure an agent with Airia Gateway credentials.

airiaGatewayUrl.description: Gets or sets the Airia Gateway URL.

gatewayConfigurationId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the gateway configuration.

selectedComponentIds.description:
Gets or sets the optional list of component IDs to secure.
If null or empty, all AI components in the agent will be secured.
If populated, only the specified components will be secured.

ConnectionTestResponse.description: Represents the response from a connection test operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the connection test operation.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the connection test operation.

message.description: Gets or sets the message describing the connection test result.

errorCategory.description:
Gets or sets the error category if status is "error".
Should be one of the constants from ErrorCategory.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the connection test was completed.

details.description: Gets or sets the detailed information about the connection test operation.

ConnectionTestDetails.description: Represents detailed information about connection test operations.

systemName.description: Gets or sets the name of the system where the connection test occurred.

responseTimeMs.description: Gets or sets the response time of the connection test in milliseconds.

TestConnectionCommand.description:
Command for testing an SPM connection.
This operation validates that a connection configuration is valid and can successfully connect to the external provider.

id.description:
Gets the optional ID of an existing SPM connection to use as base configuration.
If specified, the connection will be read from the database and missing parameters will be augmented.

name.description: Gets the name of the connection to test.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets the provider type for the connection.

connection.description: Gets the connection configuration as a key-value dictionary.

PagedResultOfAgentDirectoryResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

AgentDirectoryResponse.description: Response model for agent directory listing.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the agent.

provider.description: Gets or sets the provider type as a string.

status.description: Gets or sets the security status as a string.

modelNames.description: Gets or sets the comma-separated list of model names.

securityScore.description:
Gets or sets the security score from security analysis.
Null when SecurityScoreStatus is not Analyzed.

securityScoreStatus.description: Gets or sets the security score analysis status as a string.

securedNote.description:
Gets or sets detailed note about the secured status (e.g., error messages for unsecurable agents).
This provides specific information about why an agent cannot be secured.

models.description: Gets or sets the list of AI model components.

AgentModelComponent.description: Response model for individual model components within an agent.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the component.

externalId.description:
Gets or sets the external identifier of the component (e.g., N8n node ID).
This is the ID used to reference the component in the external system.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the AI model.

aiProvider.description: Gets or sets the AI provider name.

status.description: Gets or sets the security status as a string.

securedNote.description:
Gets or sets detailed note about the secured status of the component.
This provides specific information about the component's security state.

gatewayConfigurationId.description:
Gets or sets the gateway configuration ID associated with this component's API key, if available.
This ID references the gateway configuration used to secure this component.

GraphViewResponse.description:
Represents the complete graph view response containing provider and agent hierarchies
for displaying relationships between providers, agents, and AI models.

providers.description:
Gets or sets the list of providers with their associated agents.
Each provider is identified by its name (e.g., "N8n", "AwsBedrock") and contains
a list of agents that belong to connections using that provider.

agents.description:
Gets or sets the list of agents with their associated AI models.
Each agent contains a list of AI models (components) that are used within that agent,
providing the data needed to render agent-to-model relationships in the graph.

SpmProviderGraphNode.description:
Represents an SPM provider node in the graph view, containing the provider identifier
and its associated agents for visualization purposes.

id.description:
Gets or sets the provider identifier.
This uses the provider name as the identifier (e.g., "N8n", "AwsBedrock", "AzureFoundry")
instead of a GUID, to simplify UI processing and graph construction.

agents.description:
Gets or sets the list of agents associated with this provider.
Contains summary information about agents that belong to connections
using this secure posture provider, filtered to include only agents
that have AI model components.

SpmAgentSummary.description:
Represents a summary of an SPM agent for use in graph view provider nodes.
Contains minimal agent information needed for graph visualization.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.
This uses the agent's GUID identifier for consistency with
agent references throughout the system.

name.description:
Gets or sets the display name of the agent.
This is the human-readable name that will be displayed
in the graph visualization for the agent node.

SpmAgentGraphNode.description:
Represents an SPM agent node in the graph view, containing the agent identifier
and its associated AI models for visualization purposes.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.
This uses the agent's GUID identifier to maintain consistency
with existing agent references throughout the system.

models.description:
Gets or sets the list of AI models associated with this agent.
Contains summary information about AI model components that belong to this agent,
filtered to include only components with ComponentType.AiModel,
and using the AI model name as the identifier for simplified UI processing.

SpmModelSummary.description:
Represents a summary of an AI model component for use in graph view agent nodes.
Contains minimal model information needed for graph visualization.

id.description:
Gets or sets the identifier of the AI model.
This uses the AI model name as the identifier (e.g., "gpt-4.1-mini-2025-0414")
instead of a GUID, to simplify UI processing and graph construction
as specified in the requirements.

aiProvider.description:
Gets or sets the AI provider name associated with this model.
This indicates which AI provider (e.g., "OpenAI", "Anthropic") is used
for this model component, providing additional context in the graph view.

ExternalWorkflowDisplayResponse.description:
Represents the root response for external workflow display, containing workflow metadata,
version information, and the complete structure of workflow steps and their relationships.
This DTO transforms N8N workflow JSON into a pipeline-compatible display format.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier for the external workflow.
This is the SpmAgent.Id in the platform.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the external workflow.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the external workflow.

provider.description:
Gets or sets the workflow provider identifier.
Default value is "n8n".

isActive.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow is currently active.

externalId.description: Gets or sets the external workflow identifier from the provider system (e.g., N8N workflow ID).

externalUpdatedAt.description: Gets or sets the last updated timestamp from the external system.

workflowMetadata.description: Gets or sets the workflow metadata containing statistical information about the workflow structure.

activeVersion.description: Gets or sets the active version of the workflow, containing all steps and their relationships.

WorkflowMetadata.description:
Represents statistical metadata about a workflow's structure and composition.
Provides counts and indicators for various node types and workflow characteristics.

nodesCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of nodes in the workflow.

aiNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of AI-related nodes in the workflow.

securableNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of nodes that are eligible for security controls.

securedNodesCount.description: Gets or sets the number of nodes that currently have security controls applied.

hasLoops.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow contains loop structures.

hasMergeNodes.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow contains merge nodes.

triggerCount.description: Gets or sets the number of trigger nodes in the workflow.

tags.description: Gets or sets the list of tags associated with the workflow.

ExternalWorkflowVersion.description:
Represents a specific version of an external workflow, containing version metadata
and the complete list of workflow steps with their relationships.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this workflow version.

pipelineId.description: Gets or sets the pipeline identifier that this version belongs to.

majorVersion.description:
Gets or sets the major version number.
Default value is 1.

minorVersion.description:
Gets or sets the minor version number.
Default value is 0.

versionNumber.description:
Gets or sets the formatted version number string.
Default value is "1.00".

isDraftVersion.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a draft version.
Default value is false.

isLatest.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the latest version.
Default value is true.

alignment.description:
Gets or sets the visual alignment of the workflow display.
Default value is "Horizontal".

steps.description: Gets or sets the list of workflow steps in this version.

ExternalWorkflowStep.description:
Represents a single step (node) in an external workflow, containing its position,
dependencies, connection handles, and metadata about the node type and configuration.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this workflow step.

stepType.description:
Gets or sets the step type identifier.
Default value is "externalWorkflowStep".

stepTitle.description: Gets or sets the title/name of the step.

dependenciesObject.description: Gets or sets the list of dependency relationships to parent steps.

handles.description: Gets or sets the list of connection handles for this step.

pipelineId.description: Gets or sets the pipeline identifier that this step belongs to.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the project identifier that this step belongs to.

alignment.description:
Gets or sets the visual alignment of the step.
Default value is "Horizontal".

position.description: Gets or sets the position of the step in the visual display.

width.description: Gets or sets the width of the step node in pixels.

height.description: Gets or sets the height of the step node in pixels.

metadata.description:
Gets or sets the metadata about the external node, including type information,
AI model details, and security status.

DependencyObject.description:
Represents a dependency relationship between two workflow steps, specifying which
parent step's output handle connects to this step's input handle.

parentId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the parent step that this step depends on.

parentHandleId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the output handle on the parent step.

handleId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the input handle on this step that receives the connection.

NodeHandle.description:
Represents a connection handle on a workflow node, which defines the input or output
connection points that can be used to link nodes together.

uuid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this handle.

type.description:
Gets or sets the type of the handle (e.g., "source" for output, "target" for input).
Default value is "source".

label.description: Gets or sets the display label for the handle.

tooltip.description: Gets or sets the tooltip text to display when hovering over the handle.

Position.description: Represents the X and Y coordinates of a node's position in the visual workflow display.

x.description: Gets or sets the horizontal (X-axis) coordinate.

y.description: Gets or sets the vertical (Y-axis) coordinate.

ExternalNodeMetadata.description:
Represents metadata about an external workflow node, including type information,
category classification, AI model details, and security status.

externalType.description: Gets or sets the external node type identifier from the workflow provider (e.g., N8N node type).

category.description:
Gets or sets the category classification of the node (e.g., "AI", "trigger", "data").
Default value is "unknown".

typeVersion.description: Gets or sets the version number of the node type.

disabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node is disabled in the workflow.

isTrigger.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node is a trigger node.

notes.description: Gets or sets any notes or comments associated with the node.

color.description: Gets or sets the color code for visual display of the node.

aiModelName.description: Gets or sets the name of the AI model used by this node, if applicable.

aiProviderName.description: Gets or sets the name of the AI provider for this node, if applicable.

securityStatus.description:
Gets or sets the security status of the node (e.g., "NotSecured", "Secured", "PartiallySecured").
Default value is "NotSecured".

isSecurable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node is eligible for security controls.

IntegrationGoogleAdminRequest.description: Request model for analyzing Google Workspace third-party app integrations.

connectionId.description: Gets or sets the SPM connection ID associated with this analysis.

serviceAccountKey.description:
Gets or sets the Google service account key in JSON format.
This should be the entire contents of the service account key file.

adminEmail.description: Gets or sets the admin email to impersonate (must be a super admin).

domain.description: Gets or sets the domain name to analyze (e.g., "yourdomain.com").

scopes.description:
Gets or sets the OAuth scopes required for the operation.
Defaults to the minimum required scopes for user security and directory access.

maxUsers.description:
Gets or sets the maximum number of users to analyze.
Defaults to 1000. Set to -1 for no limit.

IntegrationMicrosoftAdminRequest.description: Request model for analyzing Microsoft Graph third-party app integrations.

connectionId.description: Gets or sets the SPM connection ID associated with this analysis.

clientId.description: Gets or sets the Azure AD application client ID.

clientSecret.description: Gets or sets the Azure AD application client secret.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the Azure AD tenant ID (can be 'common' or specific GUID).

maxUsers.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of users to analyze (default 999).

scopes.description:
Gets or sets the OAuth scopes required for the operation.
Defaults to Graph API default scope for application permissions.

SpmSettingsResponse.description:
Represents the response data for SPM settings operations.
Contains the SPM settings information including tenant context and default gateway configuration.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the SPM settings.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant identifier associated with the SPM settings.

defaultGatewayConfigurationId.description:
Gets or sets the identifier of the default gateway configuration for this tenant's SPM operations.
This optional foreign key links to a gateway configuration that will be used as the default
for SPM-related operations when no specific gateway is specified.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the SPM settings were created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the SPM settings were last updated.

userId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the user associated with the SPM settings.

UpdateSpmSettingsRequest.description: Represents a request to update SPM settings for the current tenant.

defaultGatewayConfigurationId.description:
Gets or sets the identifier of the default gateway configuration for this tenant's SPM operations.
This optional value will be used as the default gateway for SPM-related operations.

AnalysisRunSummaryResponse.description: Response DTO containing summary information about an integration analysis run.

connectionId.description:
Gets the connection ID associated with this analysis run.
Null if the connection was deleted or the run is orphaned.

connectionName.description:
Gets the connection name.
Will be "Unknown Connection" if ConnectionId is null.

providerType.description: Gets the provider type (Google or Microsoft).

status.description: Gets the status of the analysis run.

startedAt.description: Gets the timestamp when the analysis started.

errors.description:
Gets the error details as a JSON string.
Only populated if Status is Failed.

IntegrationProviderType.description: Represents the type of integration provider for third-party app analysis.

IntegrationAnalysisRunStatus.description: Represents the status of an integration analysis run.

ScanIntegrationAppsResponse.description: Response containing results of integration apps scan initiation.

analysisRunIds.description: Gets or sets list of initiated analysis run IDs.

successCount.description: Gets or sets number of connections successfully queued for scanning.

errors.description: Gets or sets list of connection IDs that failed to queue.

message.description: Gets or sets message describing the scan results.

ConnectionScanError.description: Error information for a connection that failed to scan.

connectionId.description: Gets the connection ID that failed.

ScanIntegrationAppsRequest.description: Request to scan Microsoft Graph and Google Workspace integration apps.

connectionIds.description: Gets optional list of connection IDs to scan. If null or empty, scans all Microsoft Graph and Google Workspace connections.

IntegrationRecordsResponse.description: Response model for paginated integration records.

records.description: Gets or sets the list of integration records.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of records across all pages.

pageNumber.description: Gets or sets the current page number (1-based).

pageSize.description: Gets or sets the number of records per page.

totalPages.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

allOf.description:
Represents a single third-party application integration discovered during an SPM analysis run.
This entity stores integration data for both Google Workspace and Microsoft 365 providers.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the integration record.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant ID that owns this integration record.

spmAppIntegrationAnalysisRunId.description: Gets or sets the ID of the analysis run that discovered this integration.

spmAppIntegrationAnalysisRun.description: Gets or sets the analysis run navigation property.

userIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the user identifier (email or principal name) associated with this integration.

clientId.description:
Gets or sets the client ID or application ID of the third-party application.
For Google: ClientId. For Microsoft: ClientAppId.

appName.description:
Gets or sets the display name of the third-party application.
For Google: AppName. For Microsoft: ClientAppName.

scopes.description:
Gets or sets the OAuth scopes granted to the application.
Stored as JSON array.

nativeApp.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is a native app (Google only).

anonymous.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application access is anonymous (Google only).

resourceAppId.description:
Gets or sets the resource application ID (Microsoft only).
E.g., Microsoft Graph's app ID.

resourceAppName.description: Gets or sets the friendly name of the resource application (Microsoft only).

consentType.description:
Gets or sets the consent type (Microsoft only).
E.g., 'AllPrincipals' for admin consent, 'Principal' for user consent.

origin.description: Gets or sets the origin of the permission grant (Microsoft only).

grantId.description: Gets or sets the grant ID for reference (Microsoft only).

isAIService.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is identified as an AI service.

aiServiceConfidence.description: Gets or sets the confidence score (0.0 to 1.0) of the AI service detection.

aiDetectionReasons.description:
Gets or sets the reasons why the application was identified as an AI service.
Stored as JSON array.

allOf.description:
Represents a single execution run of SPM app integration analysis for a specific provider.
Each run captures metadata about the analysis execution and contains associated integration records.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the analysis run.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant ID that owns this analysis run.

connectionId.description: Gets or sets the SPM connection ID that this analysis run is associated with.

providerType.description: Gets or sets the provider type for this analysis run.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the analysis run.

analyzedIdentifier.description:
Gets or sets the domain or tenant identifier that was analyzed.
For Google: the workspace domain. For Microsoft: the tenant ID.

totalUsers.description: Gets or sets the total number of users processed during this run.

totalIntegrations.description: Gets or sets the total number of integrations found during this run.

errors.description:
Gets or sets any errors that occurred during the analysis run.
Stored as JSON array.

startedAt.description:
Gets the timestamp when the analysis started.
Maps to CreatedAt from BaseAuditEntity.

endedAt.description:
Gets the timestamp when the analysis ended.
Maps to UpdatedAt from BaseAuditEntity.

PagedResultOfCloudflareAiAppCatalog.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

allOf.description:
Represents an AI application entry in the Cloudflare catalog.
Can be either global (seeded from Cloudflare, TenantId = null) or tenant-scoped (user-provided, TenantId set).

cloudflareAppId.description:
Gets or sets the Cloudflare application ID.
This is the unique identifier assigned by Cloudflare for each AI application.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the AI application.

categoryId.description:
Gets or sets the Cloudflare category ID for this application.
Common values: 25 = Artificial Intelligence, 36 = MCP Servers, 16 = Do Not Inspect.

categoryName.description: Gets or sets the human-readable category name.

description.description:
Gets or sets the description of what this AI application does.
This field is enriched from external data sources as Cloudflare API does not provide descriptions.

url.description:
Gets or sets the website URL for this AI application.
This field is enriched from external data sources as Cloudflare API does not provide URLs.

sourceType.description: Gets or sets the source type of this catalog entry (Library for global catalog, UserProvided for tenant-specific).

allOf.description:
Represents an entity that can be either global (non-tenant) or tenant-scoped based on the source type.
Used for entities that have both seeded global data and user-provided tenant-specific data.

id.description: Gets the Id.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the Tenant Id. Null for global/seeded entities, set for user-provided entities.

BlockCloudflareAiAppResponse.description: Response containing the Cloudflare rule ID after successfully blocking an application.

cloudflareRuleId.description: The ID of the created Cloudflare Gateway blocking rule.

CloudflareAiAppBlockStatusResponse.description: Response containing the blocking status of a Cloudflare AI application.

isBlocked.description: Indicates whether the application is currently blocked.

cloudflareRuleId.description: The Cloudflare rule ID if the application is blocked, otherwise null.

appName.description: The name of the application if blocked, otherwise null.

tools.description: Gets or sets the tools in response.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of the tools in response.

ToolDefinitionModel.description: Represents a flattened model of the tool definition, including all properties from the base entity.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was last updated.

toolType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag that indicates if the tool is native.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the tool.

standardizedName.description: Gets or sets the standardized name of the tool.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of the tool (includes provider suffix for provider-side gateway tools).

origin.description: Gets or sets the origin of the tool (Provider or Client).

description.description: Gets or sets a brief description of what the tool does.
description.example: Use this tool to get the current weather in a given location.

methodType.description: Gets or sets a method type of the endpoint for the tool.

purpose.description: Gets or sets the purpose of the tool, providing context on what it is designed to achieve.
purpose.example: When a user asks about the weather, including current conditions, forecasts, or specific weather events.

apiEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the Web API endpoint where the tool sends its requests to perform its task.

provider.description: Gets or sets the provider of the tool.

toolCredentials.description: Gets or sets the authentication properties for the tool.

headers.description: Gets or sets the headers required when making the API request.

body.description: Gets or sets the body of the request that the tool sends to the API.

bodyType.description: Gets or sets the body type of the request that the tool sends to the API.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the collection of parameters required by the tool to execute its function.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the project to which the tool is associated.

projectName.description: Gets or sets the name of the project to which the tool is associated.

children.description: Gets or sets the children of the tool definition.

routeThroughACC.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should route through the ACC.

shouldRedirect.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should redirect with authorization header attached.

accGroup.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should route through an ACC specific group.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the icon url for the tool.

documentation.description: Gets or sets the documentation of the tool.

tags.description: Gets or sets the documentation of the tool.

toolMetadata.description: Gets or sets the user provided parameters for the tool definition.

supportsPagination.description: Gets or sets the user provided parameters for the tool definition.

category.description: Gets or sets the category of the tool.

requestTimeout.description: Gets or sets the request timeout in seconds for tool execution. Default is 100 seconds.

useJwtForwarding.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool instance is configured to use JWT forwarding for authentication.
If null, the tool type does not support JWT forwarding. If true/false, the feature is available and enabled/disabled.

isCustomSelection.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether custom tool selection is enabled for this MCP server.
When null or false, all tools are enabled regardless of EnabledToolNames.
When true, only tools in EnabledToolNames list are enabled.

enabledToolNames.description:
Gets or sets the list of enabled tool names for MCP servers.
Only used when IsCustomSelection is true.
When IsCustomSelection is false or null, this is ignored and all tools are enabled.

toolCredentialSettings.description: Gets or sets the tool credential settings.

toolCredentials.description: Gets or sets the credentials for the tool.

toolCredentialsId.description: Gets or sets the authentication required to access the API.

authRequired.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether authentication is required for the tool.

useUserCredentials.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should use user based credentials.

userCredentialConnectorId.description: Gets or sets the user credential connector id for user credential store.

useUserCredentialsType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating what the credential type is when the tool use user based credentials.

credentialsSourceType.description: Gets or sets the Source Type.

useAiriaKeySupport.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool can use airia key support.

availableCredentialTypes.description: Gets or sets the available credential types.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value for the credential settings.

platformSupportedOAuthTypes.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the settings support oauth.

ToolHeaderModel.description: Represents a key-value pair header for a tool definition.

key.description: Gets or sets the key of the header.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the header.

sensitive.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this header contains sensitive data
that should be masked in responses.

ToolParameterModel.description:
Represents a parameter that a tool requires to function correctly. Each parameter provides details
about the type of data it expects, an optional description, and any default values or constraints that apply.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.

type.description: Gets or sets the data type of the parameter (e.g., string, int).

description.description: Gets or sets a brief description of the parameter, explaining its role within the tool.

default.description: Gets or sets the default value that will be used if no other value is provided.

validOptions.description: Gets or sets a list of valid options that the parameter can accept.

parameters.description: Gets or sets a list nested parameters.

requirement.description: Gets or sets the requirement level of the parameter.

ToolParameterRequirement.description: Specifies whether a tool parameter is required, optional, or an optional query parameter.

ToolsMetadataRequest.description: Represents a key-value pair header for a tool definition.

key.description: Gets or sets the key of the header.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the header.

PagedResultOfMcpServerDeploymentDto.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

McpServerDeploymentDto.description: Data transfer object for MCP server deployment.

id.description: Gets or sets the deployment ID.

gatewayLibraryId.description: Gets or sets the Gateway Library ID.

gatewayProviderConfigId.description: Gets or sets the Gateway Provider Configuration ID.

name.description: Gets or sets the deployment name.

description.description: Gets or sets the deployment description.

credentialLevel.description: Gets or sets the credential level.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the deployment is enabled.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets the icon URL.

routeThroughAcc.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to route through ACC.

accGroup.description: Gets or sets the ACC group.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the project ID.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant ID.

cachedTools.description: Gets or sets the cached tools.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the created date.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the updated date.

McpToolCacheDto.description: Data transfer object for MCP tool cache.

id.description: Gets or sets the tool cache ID.

deploymentId.description: Gets or sets the deployment ID.

toolName.description: Gets or sets the tool name.

toolDescription.description: Gets or sets the tool description.

inputSchema.description: Gets or sets the input schema.

outputSchema.description: Gets or sets the output schema.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool is enabled.

cachedAt.description: Gets or sets the cached date.

CreateMcpServerDeploymentRequest.description: Request model for creating an MCP server deployment.

gatewayLibraryId.description: Gets or sets the Gateway Library ID.

gatewayProviderConfigId.description: Gets or sets the Gateway Provider Configuration ID.

name.description: Gets or sets the deployment name.

description.description: Gets or sets the deployment description.

credentialLevel.description: Gets or sets the credential level.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the deployment is enabled.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets the icon URL.

routeThroughAcc.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to route through ACC.

accGroup.description: Gets or sets the ACC group.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the project ID.

cachedTools.description: Gets or sets the cached tools for this deployment.

CreateMcpToolCacheRequest.description: Request model for creating an MCP tool cache entry.

toolName.description: Gets or sets the tool name.

toolDescription.description: Gets or sets the tool description.

inputSchema.description: Gets or sets the input schema.

outputSchema.description: Gets or sets the output schema.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool is enabled.

UpdateMcpServerDeploymentRequest.description: Request model for updating an MCP server deployment.

name.description: Gets or sets the deployment name.

description.description: Gets or sets the deployment description.

credentialLevel.description: Gets or sets the credential level.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the deployment is enabled.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets the icon URL.

routeThroughAcc.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to route through ACC.

accGroup.description: Gets or sets the ACC group.

cachedTools.description:
Gets or sets the cached tools for this deployment.
If provided, replaces all existing cached tools.

name.description: Name of tool.

description.description: Description of tool.

parameters.description: Tool parameters.

name.description: Name of parameter.

description.description: Description of parameter.

schema.description: The complete JSON Schema for this parameter.

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the parameter is required.

McpGetAvailableToolsBody.description: Represents the body of a request to get available tools from an MCP server.

mcpServerUrl.description: Server URL to get parameters from.

credentialsSourceType.description: Source type for credentials (user-provided or library).

useJwtForwarding.description: Whether to forward the user's JWT token to the MCP server.

routeThroughACC.description: Whether to route the request through the Airia Cloud Connector (ACC).

accGroup.description: The ACC group to route through, if routing through ACC.

toolDefinitionId.description: Optional tool definition ID to filter tools based on EnabledToolNames (for edit mode).

allOf.description: The Tool definition response.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity.

PagedResultOfToolDefinitionResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

allOf.description: The Tool definition request.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity.

ToolUsageInfo.description: Contains information about where a tool is being used across pipelines.

pipelines.description: Gets or sets the list of pipelines using this tool.

isInUse.description: Gets a value indicating whether the tool is being used anywhere.

isInUseByLatestVersion.description: Gets a value indicating whether the tool is being used by the latest version of any pipeline.

ToolPipelineUsageInfo.description: Contains information about a pipeline using a tool.

pipelineId.description: Gets or sets the pipeline identifier.

pipelineName.description: Gets or sets the pipeline name.

pipelineVersionId.description: Gets or sets the pipeline version identifier.

versionNumber.description: Gets or sets the pipeline version number (major.minor format).

isLatest.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the latest version of the pipeline.

ToolSummaryItem.description: A lightweight summary representation of a tool for listing purposes.

id.description: Gets or sets the tool identifier.

name.description: Gets or sets the tool name.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the project identifier, if the tool belongs to a project.

projectName.description: Gets or sets the project name, if the tool belongs to a project.

TestConnectionResult.description: Represents the result of a tool connection test.

isSuccessful.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the connection was successful.

message.description: Gets or sets the message for the connection result.

statusCode.description: Gets or sets the message for the connection result.

TestConnectionRequest.description: Request model for testing tool connections.

toolDefinition.description: Gets or sets the tool definition to test.

testConnectionParameters.description:
Gets or sets the test connection parameters as key-value pairs.
The query should be stored with "query" as the key.

AiGatewayToolsResponse.description: Response model for AI Gateway Tools.

tools.description: Gets or sets the list of AI Gateway tools.

AiGatewayTool.description: Represents an AI Gateway tool usage event.

name.description: Gets or sets the tool name.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name for the tool (includes provider suffix for provider-side tools).

origin.description: Gets or sets the Origin for the tool (Provider, Client).

provider.description: Gets or sets the Provider for the tool (Anthropic, OpenAi etc.).

inputParameters.description: Gets or sets the input parameters.
